header.description: The Micro Focus Fortify WebInspect Enterprise plugin allows you to execute dynamic application security testing as part of a workflow.

step-type.name: Create Scan from URL
step-type.description: Create a new simple scan from a URL.

property-ui.label: Scan Name
property-ui.description: The name of the scan (for display purposes).

property-ui.label: Scan URL
property-ui.description: The URL to scan.

property-ui.label: SSC Application Name
property-ui.description: The name of the related application in Software Security Center.

property-ui.label: SSC Version Name
property-ui.description: The name of the related application version in Software Security Center.

property-ui.label: Policy Name
property-ui.description: The name of the security policy to use.

property-ui.label: Sensor Name
property-ui.description: The name of the sensor to use. Leave blank to run on any sensor

property-ui.label: Priority
property-ui.description: The priority for the scan, default is 3.

property-ui.label: WIE Server URL
property-ui.description: The WebInspect Enterprise server URL, e.g. https://server/WIE

property-ui.label: WIE Username
property-ui.description: The username to connect to the WebInspect Enterprise server.

property-ui.label: WIE Password
property-ui.description: The password to connect to the WIE server.

property-ui.label: Wait for Completion
property-ui.description: Select this option to wait until the scan has completed.

property-ui.label: Delay Interval
property-ui.description: The delay (in ms) to wait before re-checking the status.

property-ui.label: Debug Output
property-ui.description: Select this option to display debug output during execution.
